name: Pampero Boots Purple

description: The Pampero are sleek ankle high boots feature lightweight yet durable soles to make it feel like you're walking on clouds even when trekking across the most unforgiving terrain.
description_cn: "滂沛罗冷风"这款时尚的高筒靴采用轻便而结实的鞋底设计，让您在即使在最险阻的地形上徒步旅行，也能如踏云而行。
